sentence: A dozen Republicans are seeking their party's nod, including former Detroit Police Chief James Craig, chiropractor Garrett Soldano, businessman Kevin Rinke, and conservative radio host Tudor Dixon.
title: GOP primary for Wisconsin governor

sentence: Governors ? MI-Gov: MIRS has commissioned a survey of the August Republican primary by the GOP firm Mitchell Research that finds former Detroit Police Chief James Craig leading chiropractor Garrett Soldano 32-10.
title: House Democrat and indicted GOP attorney general headed to runoffs
